title: Home
slogan: The new home to easy MD generation and execution
description:
Welcome to the new Visual Dynamics.
With a revamped interface and a new methodology of generating and running GROMACS simulations we aim to provide faster, more reliable and replicable simulations, all this, through a new, more understandable and scalable codebase.

runs-on-cloud.title: Runs on Cloud
runs-on-cloud.description: MD demands time, computational power, and even more computational power, so you can rely on us to this. We run 10 simultaneous MDs, with 6 CPU cores each.

open-source.title: Free for... everyone
open-source.description: We know running a MD is not something easy, with this in mind, we develop this piece of software as a free and open-source software. Run on our hardware, your hardware, deploy your own, it is totally up to you.
